subject: Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: On the eve of Game 7 of the Eastern Conference finals, Carolina Hurricanes Coach Peter Laviolette said he wished the N.H.L. would issue a gag order on Buffalo Coach Lindy Ruff.
snippet: On the eve of Game 7 of the Eastern Conference finals, Carolina Hurricanes Coach Peter Laviolette said he wished the N.H.L. would issue a gag order on Buffalo Coach Lindy Ruff.
